title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Emotion-Driven Multimedia Mobile Instruction for Queer History Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain key events and figures in queer history with over 80% accuracy
Learners can identify three or more emotional responses occurring during multimedia-based learning processes
Based on emotion analysis results, learners can propose two or more strategies for restructuring learning content
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
